title: gaNarAjEna rakSitOham
sahitya:
gaNarAjEna rakSitOham guNijananuta pallava padEna


caraNam   aNimAdyaSta siddhi pradEna mANikya makuTAdi dharENa 
mantriNI pUjita sumukhEna mAnita guruguha vanditEna 
dinakara kOTi prakAshEna vinatAshrita mandArENa 
manu pUjita pAshAnkushEna kAnana sthita brahmacaryENa
